title: Does injury to Drew Brees open audition opportunity for Jameis Winston? Plus NFC & AFC Playoff Projections (Football 11/18)
description:
It's Wednesday and time for a Pick Six staple also known as the Brady Quinn Football Show! Will Brinson and Brady break down Drew Brees' injury and the impact it will have on the remainder of the season for the Saints and the rest of the NFL (1:30). How long could he be out? Can New Orleans survive without him? Is this a clear long-term audition opportunity for Jameis Winston? Next, the guys focus on playoff projections taking a closer look at the NFC West and who can emerge atop that division (24:30). If you haven't learned your lesson, stop sleeping on the Dolphins (41:00). Brady believes they can definitely get to 10 wins and into the playoffs which will be a miraculous feat for that franchise.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Brady_Quinn, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
